ygData.subject: Re: Deleting /friend list (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: (replying to my own message) ... Hrm - yes - let s get rid of Talies.  Apparently, he can t remember how to finish his messages before sending them.... ;) I
ygData.messageBody:
(replying to my own message)

At 07:08 PM 1/26/00 -0600, I wrote:



>No - the friends list is stored in one of the OTHER .opt files. The
>eqOptions1.opt file, in fact (just checked). The galtin.opt file is
>hotkeys only as near as I can tell. You may want to try to get rid of
>
>Talies


Hrm - yes - let's get rid of Talies. Apparently, he can't remember how to
finish his messages before sending them....

;)

I was trying to say to delete that file - EQ will recreate it as needed -
but you may need to adjust some display settings, etc.

Talies
